text: Wathi (uyise wabesifazane ababili) â€œngempela mina ngithanda ukuba ushade neyodwa yamadodakazi ami amabili ngesivumelwano sokuba ungisebenzele iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili kepha uma uqeda eyishumi kuyobe kungentando yakho futhi angithandi ukukubeka ebunzimeni uzongifumana ngingomunye wabalungileyo uma uMvelinqangi ethanda
